page.description: Filters a form or browse based on the value in a field.

argument.name: objectname
argument.description: The name of a field on the form.

argument.name: exclude
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F., .T. = Inverts the search by specifying that you want all records that do not match the current field value.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUICKSRCHEXPLICIT() method filters the records in a form or browse based on the value of a field. This is the same as right clicking on a field and selecting Quick Filter For ....

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.view("Customer Information") ptr.QuickSortExplicit("lastname")
